Class SearchActions

java.lang.Object
com.dungeonGame.logic.SearchActions
public class SearchActions extends Object
Handles player search actions in the dungeon, allowing players to look around and discover items or interact with their environment.

  • Method Details

    • lookAround

      public void lookAround(PositionDataHolder pm, PlayerDataHolder player)
      Allows the player to search the current room for items or special objects.
      • Items Found:
        • "Teleportation Spell" - Allows teleportation.
        • "Freeze Spell" - Freezes enemies.
        • "Cake" - Restores 3 power points.
        • "Sandwich" - Restores 5 power points.
        • "Hammer" - Disables traps.
        • "Potion" - Applies a random effect.
        • "Relic" (Level 3 only) - Required to defeat the Guardian.
      • Options: Players can pick up an item or ignore them.
      • Consequences:
        • If an item is picked up, it is added to the player's inventory.
        • Drinking a potion immediately applies its effect.
      Internal Method Calls:
      • GameUtils.clearConsole()
      • GameUtils.printHeader(String)
      • GameUtils.delayPrint(String)
      • PotionActions.drinkPotion(PositionDataHolder, PlayerDataHolder, String)
      • InventoryManager.addItem(PlayerDataHolder, String)
      • InventoryManager.RelicManager.markRelicFound()
      • GameUtils.waitForEnter()
      Parameters:
      pm - the player's position manager
      player - the player's data, including inventory and power points
